# [Interview #891: AMOL Signing Report - Grant, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=891#9)

#### [QuestionÂ ()](https://twitter.com/grantosan/status/288814951089459200)

Will you edit any more books?

#### Harriet McDougal

There are only 2 sentences of material for outrigger novels. RJ did not want infinite more books.
